short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copies URL of Instagram image when clicked on an Instagram image or opens context menu when right clicked

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Copies Image link of an instagram image with Left Click so you can embed it in discord , etc . You can also save or copy the image to your clipboard with a right click which will enable the context menu which is disabled by default.Please donate if you like this addon 

https://www.paypal.com/ncp/payment/FRH2C28K79DMY !
